description: Application for non-material amendments (S.96a) (alterations to the ground floor Brownlow Road and Singapore Road elevations; the removal of the green wall and replacement with metal cladding on the rear eastern elevation; deletion of condition 10 (Ultra-low boilers) - scheme to be connected to Green Man Lane so no boilers required to be installed; Variation of conditions 7 (hard and soft landscaping) - remove reference to green wall; 9 (Energy Statement Measures) -remove reference to boilers; 18 (Fresh Air Ventilation) - not possible to be taken from the rear of the building; and variation to S.106 to address tenure changes in affordable housing to now provide 25 affordable rented units and 16 shared ownership units and financial contribution of Â£46,500 towards street planting in lieu of provision of green wall) to planning permission reference PP/2015/6186 dated 16.06.2016 for "Demolition of existing BHS store and redevelopment to provide Class A1 retail unit fronting Broadway providing a store (and ancillary coffee shop) with a gross external area of 1,286 square metres over ground floor and a mezzanine of 232 square metres for back of house areas and plant rooms; 136 No. flats comprising 50 No. x 1 bed; 75 No. x 2 bed and 11 No. x 3 bed units; with ancillary areas with 226 No. secure and enclosed residents and 8 No. Class A1 staff cycle spaces; connection to District Heating system; 13 No. blue badge spaces comprising 6 No. private and 7 No. public spaces; reconfiguration of land to Singapore Road to provide service layby for retail unit"
